alert.note: Alert for Clayton; Fayette (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 23 at 10:28AM CST until January 23 at 12:00PM CST by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...Snow and Wintry Mix through the Remainder of This Morning... .Through noon, there will be snow or a wintry mix across portions of northeast Iowa and southwest Wisconsin. Snow accumulations of up to 1 inch are possible. There may also be a light glaze from light freezing rain or freezing drizzle. This wintry mix will gradually end from west and southwest early this afternoon. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TODAY... * WHAT...Snow or wintry mix of precipitation. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch and ice accumulations of a light glaze. * WHERE...In Iowa, Fayette and Clayton Counties. In Wisconsin, Grant County. * WHEN...Until noon CST today. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. In Iowa, visit 511ia.org for road conditions. In Wisconsin, visit 511wi.gov for road conditions.
